data.name: Love, Chunibyo & Other Delusions! : Japanese Audio with English Subtitles: Reminiscences... of Paradise Lost
data.short_description: A trip to Rika's hometown reveals more about her than Yuta had anticipated.  Dekomori continues her antics against her nemesis "Mori-Summer".
